data.message: Facebook you changed the blocking feature. I used to be able to block a person's account and I was able to go back to the previous page. Now when you block someone it takes you to the manage blocking page. I don't like the change.

replies.message: Thanks for your feedback, Geoff! We're constantly working to make our products better. We'll take this back to our team, and if you have any more suggestions, let us know here: http://on.fb.me/1bc3BDo. -Sarah
